text: Artis Kampars (born May 3, 1967 in Tukums) is a Latvian politician and businessman. He served as the Minister for Economics of Latvia. Kampars is a member of Unity. Kampars became a member of eighth Saeima in 2002, was reelected four years later, but lost his mandate when he became a Minister in 2009. He served as the Minister for Economics of Latvia under the first two governments led by Prime Minister Valdis Dombrovskis. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:People from Tukums Category:Democratic Party "Saimnieks" politicians Category:New Era Party politicians Category:New Unity politicians Category:Ministers of Economics of Latvia Category:Deputies of the 8th Saeima Category:Deputies of the 9th Saeima Category:Deputies of the 10th Saeima Category:Riga Technical University alumni
title: Artis Kampars
